title: Citi's Willem Buiter and Ed Morse Named to Top 100 Global Thinkers List
summary: Citi's Chief Economist Willem Buiter and Global Head of Commodities Research Ed Morse have been recognized as two of the Top 100 Global Thinkers by Foreign Policy Magazine. Ed's distinctive work on North American energy independence, launched through Citi's GPS research series, garnered him the 23rd spot on the list. Willem is ranked 29th and recognized for his research surrounding the likelihood of a Grexit.
